tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I wanted to get my wife treated at Motherhood but I was looking for good doctor and I came across Dr. Nusrath. We were lucky to get Dr. Nusrath for my wife, she is friendly, polite and assisted my wife well throughout the pregnancy and until NVD. She built that trust with us and also gave confident to my wife as it was the first pregnancy.  

Dr. Nusrath's expertise, experience and the way she handled the patience is beyond expressing in words. I already recommended her to my friends and relative and few of them have already started consulting with her. 
We are very thankful that we have met Dr. Nusrath. 
Thank you Dr. 
Imran&Wajiha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We are thankful to god that we met our doctor, Dr. Nusrat, for the exceptional care she gave to my wife throughout her pregnancy, delivery, and postpartum time, your assistance and direction were wonderful and great.
We felt less stressed and appreciate everything you done.

She is very Optimistic person and supported every moment when we needed her. 

We feel incredibly lucky to have had you as our doctor during this important time in our lives .

Thank you again üòäüòä
Nizam and Ruhi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Can‚Äôt praise her enough for the patience, love and care she has towards her patients..
It‚Äôs been a wonderful journey for me with Dr. Nusrat and team from my 3 months gestation until my delivery.. 
Dr. Nusrat always made sure that we stay calm irrespective of any health challenges faced.. she has always gives you so much of confidence that she would do her best for us.. I always came back home assured and safe that everything will be taken care of..

I had given up on having a normal delivery and so had my family as my dilations did not progress at a faster rate.. but ma‚Äôam and her team did not.. she gave her best of efforts and patience and helped me have a normal delivery with absolutely no complications at all..thanks to ma‚Äôam that my pregnancy journey was so smooth and easy‚Ä¶

I highly recommend Dr. Nusrat to every pregnant woman out there for a wonderful, safe and a hassle 
free journey ‚ô•Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I  would like to share my latest consulting experience with Dr. Nusrat A. H.

Dr. Nusrat A. H. is a nice, calm, well poised, caring, well behaved and extremely welcoming doctor. After we came out of the visit, both of us were extremely happy that finally we found the right doctor. There was no other doubts thereafter. Her decisions are very clear and straight forward.  Unless there seems a complication that exists, she would never suggest for C-Section. She listened and answered our queries appropriately and made sure we are relaxed
I had a normal delivery. Dr. Nusrat and her team made sure the delivery procedure happens very smoothly. 
My special thanks and gratitude to Dr. Nusrat for treating us with love and care and making sure everything ends perfectly. 
I have already recommend few of my relatives and friends to consult Dr. Nusrat.
Thank you Dr for making my pregnancy a very beautiful journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Special thanks to Dr. Nusrat Mam.*** ** *** **** ************ *** ************ *** don‚Äôt have words to describe her expertise, confidence, intelligence, politeness. We started consulting her before pregnancy and aftee the first month of my wife's pregnancy and continued till delivery. We never thought about consulting any other doctor. All of our queries were answered appropriately and on time. She made sure that we are relaxed throughout. She treated us with lots of love and made sure that everything ends perfectly. She gave us the best experience. We've already suggested few of our friends to this hospital and the doctor I've consulted.
Thank you ma‚Äôam for being there for us in our beautiful journey. We are indebted towards you always for your care and warmth during this Phase

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had a very good overall experience. We applaud and appreciate the way she handled all our queries and concerns from day 1. We visited a few doctors prior to meeting her and once we consulted her, we were totally satisfied. We were referred to her by one of our close family friend who had a similar experience consulting her. Dr. Nusrath is very experienced, humble and friendly in her approach. Listens to all your concerns patiently. She ensured that she was available at all times when we needed her. We highly recommend Dr. Nusrath and thank her for the wonderful experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly I am writing this on behalf of my wife , not sure where to start , we choose Dr.Nusrat after a not so good experience from another doc from a reputable Hospital in south Bangalore 

Our first experience with was like why didn‚Äôt come here earlier , we have seen and heard about different dr‚Äôs but we haven‚Äôt come across anyone who is the epitome of humbleness and patience 

We have had multiple misscarriages in the past , a very very complex previous pregnancy ( The boy is 8 yrs ) 

Dr.Nusrat was all ears to our previous history and literally hand held us through out our journey 

She was always calm ,composed, followed process meticulously at the same time showed how much experience matters 

We strongly recommend dr Nusrat for any or for all kind of pregnancy and related issue 

we are blessed with a daughter and we can‚Äôt thank her enough

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It's a pleasure to share my experience with DR Nusrat.i consulted her during 8th month of my pregnancy were i believe that it was the best decision ever made choosing her as my gynecologist.

The top qualities which i experienced are:

‚Ä¢Clear study about the patient issue
‚Ä¢24/7 availability
‚Ä¢Closely monitoring the patient 

Along with being best doctor she is also an amazing, lovely,caring,calm and kind hearted person.

As i was over weight and normal delivery was bit complicated but doctor never gave up on me since day 1 and tried her level best to get baby delivered normally so doctor and her team were finally successful in that who put there  üíØ% efforts .

Special thanks to Dr Nusrat from me and my family that she stood by me being a great support system and kept motivating on each and every instance for getting the best results.

She is the major reason in my life for getting me recovered so soon with out letting in pain for longer time.no words to describe her favour on me .

I would highly recommend Dr Nusrat for pregnant women's for there special journey of life to get the best experience.

Along being a doctor, she is a very amazing and humble person. i had a bit of tough times during my pregnancy but meeting her each time i used to feel relax snd comfortable.Down to earth and always smiling. She even remember name of my daughter till now, that shows her human side which is rare to find in todays time.She understands the process of childbirth and its challenges to women. A great mentor and counselor as well

I'm really happy to write about Madam. She is so friendly so that we never feel we are taking with doctor, she used to address all kind of problem or questions asked from us. We are happy for her treatment. It's highly recommend any kind of gynecology related issues. 

Thanks Doctor for all your efforts.
